Question.Subject: Why do the voices not go with their mouths?
Question.Content: When I am watching a movie from a site. The voices will be behind what they are saying on that scene. How do I fix this and why is it happening?
Question.ChosenAnswer: You could try using a different video player, but usually you can't do much when it's streaming. I would recommend installing VLC (www.videolan.org/vlc/) and see if that helps. If the option is there, download the file and play with VLC, that way you have the option of adjusting the video/sound position.

Answer.Content: Pause the video and let it load, you might want to start it over, too.

You could try using a different video player, but usually you can't do much when it's streaming. I would recommend installing VLC (www.videolan.org/vlc/) and see if that helps. If the option is there, download the file and play with VLC, that way you have the option of adjusting the video/sound position.
